name: Cube Land (dudif, RockNBurn)
description:
Players can interact with any yellow object.
To move the pipes, click and hold the left mouse button.
To rotate the valves, left-click on them.

Controls:
[W, A, S, D] or arrows to move the character.
Space to jump.
Use the mouse to rotate the camera.
Left-click to interact.

It's almost bedtime, and you need some light to enjoy your favourite book. What do you do? Go for a quest to find the mystical Crystal of Nighttime Readings, of course.
And to achieve that, you must use the cannons around the world (Don't ask) to solve puzzles and smash the raw materials and get yourself that special reading light.
